txt.en: Zhélruka Soldiers can be found at Zarkul-sulûn.\n\nYou should deliver Náin the Slakeless's war orders to the Zhélruka Soldiers.
Deliver war orders to the Zhélruka soldiers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Take these orders. I am giving the best Zhélruka warriors important missions. These missions, if successful, are certain to turn the tides of war! Deliver them at once, [placeholder]. For Gundabad!'
Náin the Slakeless, Lord of the Iron Hills, has taken charge of Zarkul-sulûn with hopes of steering the dwarves to victory.
Delivered war orders to the Zhélruka soldiers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'I will get to these as soon as I am able!'
